featured.text: He hoped to sell 26 as material for tents or wagon covers.
A goat came in our tent at night and ate most of our food!

definition.zh_def: 帳篷，一種可移動的遮蔽物，通常由布料或其他材料製成，用於露營或戶外活動。
definition.en_def: A tent is a portable shelter made of fabric or other materials, typically used for camping or outdoor activities.
definition.example: We set up our tent by the lake for a weekend camping trip.
